long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every day companies worldwide release upgrades on their products or they come out with new products with new features. There’s approximately 250,000 new products released worldwide each year.
Although it’s a wonderful thing that technologies and products evolve and make our lives easier, it can be difficult to choose what products fit you the best. Regardless if you need a new microwave, bicycle or new shoes the alternatives are endless. The web application Shop'r will help you through your search for the perfect fit.
With Shop'r you can browse the web and whenever you find something you would consider to buy, with a few clicks you can save that product to your personal Shop'r account.  You can organize your potential purchase in collections for easy management. The endless line of tabs in your browser window with potential products to buy that will disappear as soon as you close the browser is no more. Save it to your Shop'r account and gain access to them on all your devices.

Create your account at https://www.shopr-app.com
